# node-wiki-book

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/node-wiki-book
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/node-wiki-book
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install node-wiki-book
node-wiki-book <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g node-wiki-book
node-wiki-book <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
